trans-unit.source: Defines an individual endpoint contained in the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 定義 XML Web 服務中包含的個別端點。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies a single address (URI) for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>, which defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a given <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會指定單一位址 (URI) <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>，其定義的作業和訊息。 指定<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>訊息格式和通訊協定詳細資料</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A> property gets or sets those values for a specified `Port`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A>屬性取得或設定針對指定這些值`Port`。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<port>` element, which is enclosed by the `<service>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會對應至 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL)`<port>`元素，其以`<service>`項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl.
trans-unit.target: 如需 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱在 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl 規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<binding>" name="<binding>" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的 xml 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_<binding>" name="<binding>" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A binding defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結會定義作業的訊息格式和通訊協定詳細資料和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>訊息

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets those values for a specific `Port`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性取得或設定這些值的特定`Port`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the XML binding.
Gets the collection of extensibility elements associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的擴充性項目的集合<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The collection of extensibility elements associated with the port.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠相關聯的擴充性項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> is a member.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> is a member.
